author: Anushka Basu
title: 95% of Meta shareholders want nothing to do with a Bitcoin Treasury
description: Meta rejects Bitcoin treasury proposal, reaffirms focus on stablecoin integration over crypto reserves.
content:
95% of Meta shareholders want nothing to do with a Bitcoin Treasury originally appeared on TheStreet.
At Meta Platforms' annual shareholder meeting on May 30, shareholders overwhelmingly opposed a p… [+2211 chars]
